tw.releaseNotes: 此更新包含一些錯誤修正與改進，以求持續改善應用程式，維持高品質。
tw.description:
於 App Store 獨家上架，針對 iPad 量身打造，精心設計，提供強大功能 - Inspire Pro 可提供極速逼真的繪畫、繪圖與素描體驗，讓您隨身攜帶並於靈感迸發時，隨時隨地進行創作。

我們的專利繪圖引擎 Sorcery™ 充分運用 GPU 效能，讓筆觸擁有絢爛的 64 位元色彩、雷射般銳利的子像素精細度和極致高速。 濕潤的油畫筆觸看起來很漂亮，而幹筆劃驚人的混合效果同樣會完全讓你驚嘆。稍用一點力塗抹畫布，爲您的作品添加微妙的模糊效果，或者再用大點力將畫布上現有的顔色混合在一起，創造出新的色彩。 

不論是新秀藝術家、經驗豐富的專業人士或處於兩者之間的藝術工作者，皆可享有 iPad 上最直觀迷人之繪圖應用程式 Inspire Pro 的簡潔設計和強大功能。

畫筆
• 共有 150 種優質筆刷可供選擇 (分為 15 組)：油畫、噴槍、噴漆、顏料潑濺、石墨鉛筆、蠟筆、麥克筆、粉筆、炭筆、粉彩筆和炭精筆、基本圖形、複雜圖形、圖形外框、圖樣和紋理
• 所有畫筆均可用作濕刷、幹刷（混合）或擦除器
• 超過20種不同的背景可用于定制畫筆筆觸，功能强大、變化多樣。

油畫
• Sorcery™，App Store上最快的64位噴漆引擎
• 完整支援 Apple Pencil 壓力、傾斜角度、方向和雙擊功能
• 支援 Smart Keyboard，並提供 20 多組依使用情境而定的鍵盤快捷鍵
• 在iPad Pro上可創建尺寸最大爲16K（64MP）的畫布
• 雙紋理刷
• 64位彩色
• 始終支持所有設備情况 - 輕鬆地從人像切換到風景畫
• 可1000級撤消和重做
• 觸摸和滑動熱點可用于快速更改畫筆大小、不透明度和壓力，而無需打開菜單
• 可長按吸管工具，從畫布中選擇塗料顔色
• 畫布可以移動、旋轉和放大，最多可達6400％

畫布回放視頻錄製
• 自動記錄筆觸效果，隨時繪製
• 您可以直接在作品庫中播放你一筆一筆作畫的視頻
• 畫布回放視頻可以導出到您的照片或任何其他目的地
• 導出的視頻是高品質高清晰度的，分辨率高達1080p

拾色器
• 使用直觀的拾色器，選擇您喜歡的任何塗料顔色
• HSB（色調-飽和度-亮度）和RGB（紅綠藍）滑塊，伴隨著一個大色環、彩色方塊和不透明滑塊
• 在繪畫時，您最近使用的顔色會自動保存到調色板中
• 您還可以通過拖放將您喜愛的顔色保存到調色板中

訪問snowCanoe.com 查看更多截圖、視頻和圖稿。

tw.releaseNotes: Lunar arc addition, improvements to performance, and feed.
tw.description:
Plan sun and moon positions before you arrive. Predict golden hour, moonrise, and light direction—plus widgets that keep key times visible at a glance.

Know where the light will be—before you go.

Solar Arc is a sun and moon planning tool built for people who care about timing, direction, and alignment. Instead of guessing or arriving too late, you can predict exactly how light will move across a location—hours or days in advance.

Whether you’re scouting, planning a shoot, or timing a sunset or moonrise, Solar Arc gives you clarity before you commit.

--

Plan with Precision

• Live Sun & Moon Arc Visualization
See real-time solar and lunar paths with compass-based direction.

• Golden Hour & Blue Hour Forecasts
Know the precise windows when light is at its best.

• Moonrise & Moonset Planning
Track lunar timing and position for night and landscape work.

• Forecasting & Location Planning
Preview sun and moon paths for any date, anywhere.

• Offline Access
All core planning tools work without a connection in the field.

tw.description:
歡迎我們的客人蒞臨鏽湖旅館，並確保他們在此過得愉快。本週將有5頓晚餐，確保每頓晚餐都值得讓他們為之獻身！

《鏽湖旅館》是一款獨特的益智遊戲，它離奇古怪的場景設置靈感源自於大衛‧林區的電視連續劇《雙峰》。

主要特點：

操作簡單：容易上手，但一玩起來就停不下來。
無數的謎題：共有6個房間，充滿了各式各樣又獨特的腦力激盪。
驚悚而動人的故事：將會有5次伴有有趣的客人和員工們的用餐。
懸念叢生的氛圍：鏽湖旅館是一個超現實的地方，在這裡任何事情都有可能發生……
令人印象深刻的配樂：每個房間都有專屬設計的主題曲。
成就：一個你從未見過的空前走廊。

我們會一步一步地揭開鏽湖的謎題。若想了解遊戲的最新進展，請隨時查詢我們的官網RustyLake.com 或者關注我們的Facebook @rustylakecom

-已針對不用控制器的使用者改進了項目位置

tw.description:
Klei Entertainment與《超級兄弟：劍與巫術》、《超時空戰隊》和《Below》（深入地下）的開發商CAPY攜手合作，為《饑荒》的粉絲們奉上最新的單人遊戲資料片：《饑荒：海難》！

在《饑荒：海難》中，威爾遜發現自己被困在了一個熱帶群島中。在全新的環境中，迎接他的是新的生物、生物群落及季節，他必須學會適應這一切才能逃出生天。

千萬不要因為熱帶微風的吹拂而萌生性命無憂的錯覺，形勢可能急轉直下，但這依然是殘酷的環境與玩家的不妥協之間的一場較量。你很快便會發現，島嶼上充滿凶險，殺機四伏。

主要功能

在茫茫大海中前行：打造一艘船，然後揚帆開啟探險之旅！

探索新世界：世界大不同。探索充滿著新資源的全新生物群落。搜尋新的食物來源。利用眾多新生物維生。

應對全新的季節挑戰：熱帶地區的一系列季節挑戰勢要將你置於死地。

打造全新配方：打造一系列新工具，努力克服島上的惡劣環境並生存下去。

tw.description:
在一所心理健康中心裡醒來的Robert Hill罹患了嚴重的失憶症。他需要每天遵循嚴格的作息時間，通過探索自己的夢境來找回記憶。

The White Door是一款由方塊逃脫和鏽湖系列遊戲的開發者製作的指向與點擊式冒險遊戲。

關鍵特徵:

■ 操作簡單
容易上手，但一旦玩起來就停不下來

■ 獨特的故事線
每天恪守嚴格的作息時間，探尋夢境，並找回記憶。多樣的謎題妙趣橫生，讓你意猶未盡。

■ 前所未有的分屏式體驗
你將有機會探尋Robert Hill在心理健康中心裡的經歷，而全新的分屏模式也會帶給你一個嶄新的體驗。

■ 極具代入感的氛圍
精神衛生中心每天的氣氛變幻莫測，懸念叢生，讓你沉浸在詭譎疊起的情節裡不能自拔。

■ 身臨其境般的音效
由Victor Butzelaar製作的主題曲和音效讓你身臨其境。

■ 特別成就
The White Door會留下很多尚待揭曉的懸念。

tw.description:
艾蘭德（Eilander）家族中的長子——雅各布（Jakob）在母親去世後回到了天堂島。自從母親離奇死亡後，這座島嶼彷彿被十災詛咒了。一起來尋找母親的隱藏記憶，參加離奇的家族儀式，阻止災禍的發生！

《鏽湖：天堂島》是由創作了《方塊逃脫》系列、《鏽湖旅館》和《鏽湖根源》的鏽湖推出的第三個點選式冒險遊戲。

遊戲特性：

遊戲容易上手：易於上手卻讓你愛不釋手
獨特的故事情節：首個基於埃及十災的冒險遊戲
一玩難忘的解謎遊戲體驗：每一場災禍都有獨特的風格、懸念及充滿鏽湖特色的燒腦謎題
令人激動的畫面設計：由荷蘭畫家約翰·赦夫特（Johan Scherft）手繪的粉筆畫背景
超有畫面感的遊戲音樂：每場災禍都有自己的主題曲和變奏曲
成就：島上還有更多的秘密等你揭開

我們會一步一步揭開鏽湖的謎題。若想了解遊戲的最新進展，請隨時查詢我們的官網 RustyLake.com 或者關注我們的微博 @RustyLake_official

tw.description:
***注意：Don`t Starve需要iOS 8和至少iPhone 5、iPad 3或iPad mini 2。由於記憶體限制，它無法在更早的裝置上執行。***

Don`t Starve: Pocket Edition行動版將深受超過4百萬玩家喜愛的熱門PC遊戲移植到了iPhone和iPad平台。現在你可以隨時隨地進入充滿科學和魔法元素的世界，體驗原汁原味的荒野生存遊戲！

你扮演威爾遜，一位被困住並傳送到神秘荒野世界的勇敢無畏的紳士科學家。如果威爾遜希望逃出生天並找到回家的路，他必須充分利用所處的環境及這裡的各種生物。

進入一個光怪陸離而未經探索的世界，這裡充滿了奇怪的生物以及形形色色的危險和意外。收集資源以製作符合你的生存風格的物品和建築。一路解開這塊奇怪大陸上的各種謎團。

********************************************************

獎項：
- 獨立遊戲節：大獎提名
 - 獨立遊戲節：優秀設計獎提名
 - 獨立遊戲節：玩家選擇獎提名
 - Capsule Computers：編輯選擇獎
 - Indie Game Reviewer：年度最佳遊戲

主要特色：

針對觸控操作進行優化：新的直觀觸控介面讓你可以輕鬆探索、戰鬥、合成和管理物品。

原汁原味的生存和世界探索體驗：沒有說明。沒有幫助。無需手持。從一無所有開始，為了生存而合成物品、捕獵、研究、耕種和戰鬥。

黑暗而異想天開的視覺效果：處於獨特3D世界中的2D人物和古怪生物。

隨機產生的新世界：想要新地圖？沒問題！你可以隨時產生一個不斷變化的全新世界，它憎恨你並想你死掉。

tw.description:
當詹姆斯·范德布姆在自己所繼承房子的花園裡種下一顆特殊的種子後，他的生活發生了遽變。在人生之樹上通過揭開畫像來擴展你的血緣關係。
《銹湖：根源》是由創作了密室逃脫系列銹湖旅館的銹湖公司開發的第二款付費點擊類冒險遊戲。

關鍵特徵：
操作簡單：容易上手，但一旦玩起來就停不下來。
獨一無二的故事情節：經歷遊戲角色們的人生始末，並建立你獨屬的家譜。
超過33個等級：目前為止最大規模的鏽湖遊戲，充滿了謎題。
懸念叢生的氛圍：在冷靜與黑暗時刻間的轉換。
身臨其境般的音效：每個等級都有特別設計的主題曲和變奏曲。
成就：家譜有更多的秘密等待揭示。
點擊/輕擊箭頭，使用拖拽或滑動等方式在遊戲環境中導航。某些物品可以拖動。通過輕擊/點擊與人們以及各種物品進行互動。選擇在你的清單中找到的物品，並輕擊屏幕上的某處來使用它們。

我們會一步一步揭開鏽湖的謎題。若想了解遊戲的最新進展，請隨時查詢我們的官網 RustyLake.com 或者關注我們的微博 @RustyLake_official

tw.releaseNotes:
The Past Within - 更新版本 

為了慶祝Rusty Lake迎來第九週年，我們在 Underground Blossom 以及 The Past Within in 兩款遊戲加點巧思，開發新的小遊戲。歡迎關注我們的平台，查看如何從The Past Within的過去和未來之間，解鎖這次的祕密小遊戲！

更新說明 

- 新的祕密：你可以從 Underground Blossom 最新的更新版本內，查找這款祕密小遊戲的存取方式！
- 修正一些小錯誤


感謝你們的支持！
tw.description:
備註：The Past Within 是一款雙人合作遊戲。雙方玩家皆須於各自的設備上備有此款遊戲（手機、平板或電腦）以及互相溝通的管道。與夥伴一起遊玩，或到官方Discord來找尋志同道合的夥伴吧！

自己一人是無法探索未來與過去的！快找朋友一同拼湊線索來解開Albert Vanderboom的謎團。和朋友互相交流自己所看見的世界，來幫助彼此解開謎題、探索不同的時空！

The Past Within 是首款雙人合作的 點擊式冒險遊戲，架構於Rusty Lake的神祕世界中。

特色

▪ 達到雙人合作的經驗 
與朋友一起遊玩，一位探索過去，一位開發未來。一同合作來解開謎團，幫助Rose啟動她父親的計畫！
▪ 兩個世界 - 兩種視角 
兩位玩家將會以不同的層面去探索各自的世界。既有2D也有3D呈現 - 一種從未存在於 Rusty Lake 世界觀的遊玩方式！
▪ 跨平台遊玩
只要能與夥伴互相溝通，你們即可於各自偏好的平台一同來進行遊戲，支援的系統有：Mac、PC以及Nintendo Switch！
▪ 遊玩時長＆可重複遊玩
此遊戲含有兩個篇章，平均遊玩時間約為２小時。若想全方面體驗此款遊戲，我們非常建議可以再以不同的視角遊玩一次。 此外！可透過重複遊玩來使用嶄新的視角去解開謎團。

tw.description:
沉浸於Rusty Lake 所打造的地鐵內，在 Laura Vanderboom的生命及回憶中穿梭

探索在象徵著Laura過去與未來的站台之間。解開謎題，尋覓並搭上列車，揭曉Laura的人生經歷，幫助她理解這曲折的人生，逃離腐壞的內心

「Underground Blossom」是一款由 the Cube Escape & Rusty Lake 系列的創作者所新開發的點擊式冒險遊戲，
特色

▪ 於熟悉的設定裡找到新體驗
沉浸在Rusty Lake經典的點擊式謎題當中，扣人心弦的神祕故事外，當然還有更多謎題等著各位

▪ 本車將於多站停留
本次路線將於七處獨特的車站進行停留，各站特色皆展示了Laura Vanderboom的生活、回憶及潛在的未來。預計旅程時間為兩小時

▪ 聰明的你們知道該如何做
一如往常，各位將在各車站解開藏在意想不到之處的祕密，獲得成就之餘，或許還會意外發現什麼其他驚喜！

▪ 戴上耳機更沉浸其中
每一站皆有由Victor Butzelaar量身打造的氛圍音樂迎接各位，更棒的是，遊戲中還有由大提琴家Sebastiaan van Halsema所帶來的演奏，讓整個體驗更為豐富！

tw.releaseNotes: 感謝遊玩《Follow the Meaning》！你能找到新的隱藏成就嗎？
tw.description:
一封絕望的信件將Paul Trilby偵探召喚至一座奇特的島嶼小鎮，該小鎮被高牆分隔，並由醫院掌控。當地居民進入醫院後，卻是失去記憶後地回來。一個險惡的陰謀正在當地醞釀著。你能解開這個謎團的真相嗎？

運用你的智慧、好奇心和發散性思維，藉由當地居民的協助，一步步破解謎題。請記住，當地的流言中總藏有一絲真相

《Follow the Meaning》是一款受經典遊戲 Samorost與Rusty Lake系列啟發的超現實手繪點擊冒險遊戲

特色

■ 手繪美術帶你走進這個別具一格的世界
■ 奇異的世界觀下隱藏著險惡的氣息
■ 由Victor Butzelaar創作的氛圍音樂
■ 一個等待你細心挖掘的扭曲謎團
■ 平均遊戲時間：1.5 小時

In this update: 
 Fixed some minor bugs and improved stability

We’d love to hear from you! If you have any ideas, suggestions, or feature requests for future versions, feel free to share them with us anytime.

tw.description:
WHAT IS ScanGo?
ScanGo is a little, simple, flexible, easy-to-use app with kinds of features satisfying different situations in your iPhone. It allows you to scan documents, certificates, credit cards, invoices, receipts, tickets and any paper with high quality image & PDF output. Also, you can extract text by OCR function from any scans just by one tap.
It is also a camera scanner with concise, efficient user interface whose main tone is black & white with teal & chrome yellow embellished throughout the app. 

HOW TO SCAN DOCS?
- Scan everything by one click, of course you can choose to scan from Photos or Camera.
- Edit docs after scanning immediately, including add, rotate, adjust, reorder and delete pages.
- Rotate, Crop and Adjust filter to get high quality scans.
- Provided five filter modes to enhance your scans - Original, B&W 1, B&W 2, Color, Grayscale. What’s more, each filter can be adjusted for its own Brightness, Contrast, Saturation and Sharpness.

HOW TO MANAGE DOCS?
- The Recents module on home page shows your recently added docs, which helps to find them faster.
- Add folders and sub-folders to manage scanned docs.
- Rename folders and documents to make them more distinguishable.
- Important and urgent documents can be Starred for faster access.
- Search function helps to find the doc you need from a dizzying array.
- Every folder, doc and page can be shared with email, Dropbox, Google Drive, Evernote etc. or Wifi directly.
- Save scans as JPEG to Photos.
- Move/Copy/Delete docs and pages.
- Print scans directly within app once you connect to a Printer.
- Fax scans directly if you have Fax Pro app installed.

AFRAID OF DATA LOSS?
ScanGo supports syncing data with iCloud. 

MAKE THE APP MORE EFFICIENT
CONVENIENT - Turn on the camera immediately whenever you open the app.
HANDY - Save scans to Photos automatically.
EASY - Auto edge detection and enhancement.
SIMPLE - Share docs and folders in default PDF size.
SECURE - Protect your documents with passcode.

MORE QUESTIONS?
If you have any problems with ScanGo, please email us at scango@beesoft.io, we’ll help to figure it out asap.

tw.description:
《無處遁形：全網公敵》是Steam平臺廣受好評的劇情向駭客解密遊戲《全網公敵》手遊版本。玩家通過網絡蒐索和社工手段獲取目標人物資訊，其隱藏最深的秘密都無處遁形。遊戲中的每個故事看似各自獨立，但隨著劇情的發展卻是草蛇灰線，伏脈千里。當所有事件串聯起來，竟隱藏著驚天的秘密……

希望玩家在遊玩的同時，對網絡本身也能產生反思，學會保護好個人隱私。

【遊戲內容】
◆第一章：程式師之死
某公司CEO跳樓自殺，自稱被毒妻勒索千萬； 而妻子卻在社交網絡上發佈被家暴的照片。 謠言滿天，誰在說謊？
◆第二章：看不見的眼睛
女大學生的不雅視頻在網絡瘋傳，這一刻，她已然社會性死亡。 到底誰才是始作俑者？ 女性的安全又該由誰去保護？
◆第三章：消失的證據
品學兼優的學生會長忽然失踪。 霸淩事件使案情越發撲朔迷離。 誰是兇手，誰是受害者？
◆第四章：羞辱的代價
天降巨瓜，女歌星再次被爆黑料！ 恐嚇信、炒作、前女團成員自殺事件……網絡再掀輿論狂歡！
◆第五章：永生代碼
當社會陷入癲狂，你是否也願意加入永生代碼，獲得真正的愛與永生？
◆DLC：甜蜜之家
一個看似甜蜜而美滿的家庭背後，每個人都有各自的秘密，隱藏在背後的真相到底是什麼？！
◆DLC：HelloWorld
一場離奇的車禍，讓泰坦公司的高級研究員Lucrezia Borgia博士當場死亡，同行的Benjamin Engle死裡逃生，但他卻沒有意識到自己即將捲入一場巨大的陰謀之中……

【遊戲特點】
◆代入感强：在虛構的世界裏，玩家扮演一名駭客，接受一家公司委託，完成一個個不同的社工事件，體驗真實的駭客操作。
◆玩法多樣：遊戲內有多個系統，除了社工系統，還會有推理、追跡、解謎，破壞侵入等系統需要玩家們去一一攻破。
◆劇情複雜：遊戲中你將面臨大量的選擇和謎題，而不同的選擇可能將導致不同的結局。
◆人物眾多：登場人物眾多，每個人物都有自己的性格特點，而他們背後都有著不為人知的故事，需要作為駭客的你去一一發現事件的真相。
◆全程配音：遊戲中所有出現的角色都有真人配音，讓整個遊戲的體驗和代入感更加强烈。
◆原創音樂：多首原創主題曲以及各種音樂音效，搭配精彩劇情，享受震撼體驗。

【覈心功能】
◆網絡蒐索：玩家通過瀏覽器搜索功能收集目標對象的基礎資訊。
◆資料庫：利用已知資訊輸入到資料庫中，通過篩選後或許目標對象的其他資訊。
◆破解：通過獲得的目標人物資訊來生成密碼，用於登入各平臺的帳戶（包括郵箱、社交平臺、聊天軟體等）。
◆偽裝：獲取目標對象的需求、社交圈等，根據資訊選擇偽裝，通過和目標對象接觸獲取更多資訊。
◆聊天溝通：添加目標對象為好友後，進行聊天溝通獲取資訊。
◆圖片分析：從圖片中獲取有價值的資訊內容及相關線索。
當然，後期還會解鎖更多的高階社工方法！

us.releaseNotes:
The game now has Game Center integration with cloud save and achievements!

Now, your progress is saved for each puzzle! You can leave the game at any point and return to where you left off.

The way the touch works has been modified so that the shapes can be placed more easily.

We also fixed some bugs.
us.description:
Window seat or aisle? Booth or table? Lone wolf or life of the party? In Is This Seat Taken?, your mission is to organize groups of people according to their preferences. It’s a cozy, no-pressure logic puzzle game where you’re in charge of who sits where.

Whether it’s the cinema, a crowded bus, a wedding reception, or a cramped taxi cab, every setting introduces new characters with specific tastes. A party guest with a sensitive nose won’t be happy sitting next to a stranger who’s wearing too much cologne. A sleepy passenger won’t be happy trying to nap on the bus next to someone listening to loud music. It’s all about reading the room to find the perfect placement!

Nat is an aspiring actor whose world gets turned upside down when they see a shape just like them on the big screen. This discovery sends Nat on a global journey to meet their hero and figure out how to fit in. Experience Nat's heartfelt story as you travel from city to city, each with its own levels, characters, and charm.

- Play seating matchmaker to please picky characters.
- Discover each character’s unique traits—relatable, outlandish, and everything in between.
- Piece together satisfying puzzles with no timers or leaderboards.
- Unlock fun new scenarios as you progress—from bus rides to banquets!

us.releaseNotes: Bug fixes and performance improvements
us.description:
Race across the world through colorful and stylized environments in top-down view.
Compete for first place in the leaderboards with daily and weekly challenges.
Will you master the art of rally?

Experience the golden era of rally in Career mode, traveling across 78 stages from Finland to Sardinia, Norway, Japan, Germany, Kenya and Indonesia.

Get behind the wheel of your favorite vintage cars, ranging from the 60’s to the 80’s, Group B, Group S and Group A.

From beginner-friendly options to driving modes that’ll challenge the most expert drivers, all players can tackle the races using their favorite rally driving tricks: Scandinavian flick, counter steering, left foot braking, handbrake turns.

Get your name out at the top of the Leaderboard in our daily and weekly challenges.

Show off your driving skills, or simply your favourite landscapes, with the integrated Photo and Replay mode.

us.description:
The much anticipated sequel to ‘The Room’, Apple’s Game of the Year 2012 and recipient of a BAFTA award, is here at last. 
Follow a trail of cryptic letters from an enigmatic scientist known only as "AS" into a compelling world of mystery and exploration.
 
*******************************************************************************************************************

Included in Apple's Best of 2013 Awards.

 “An intricately woven work of fiction perfectly suited to its format, this is the sort of game that it's worth sitting in the dark for.” - Pocketgamer   
 
 “A gorgeous-looking game offering larger locations with multiple interactive areas and puzzles. A perfect game for a cold winter's night.” – Eurogamer
 
 “Leaves you thinking about how to solve its puzzles even when not playing; a sign of a classy game, which this most definitely is.” – 148Apps
 
 “A superb sequel with stunning visuals, the level of complexity on display here is quite astounding. The Room Two should be on top of your gaming list.” - GSM Arena 
 
 “An exceptionally good puzzle game; if you liked The Room, be sure to download the sequel” – PadGadget  
 
 “One of the best experiences on the iPad. Not just a game, but an experience that is not to be missed, an absolute must buy.” – Apple ‘n’ Apps 
 
“An incredibly compelling experience with clever puzzles, gorgeous visuals, and a spooky atmosphere; absolutely brimming with new ideas.” – The Verge

*******************************************************************************************************************

PICK-UP-AND-PLAY DESIGN
Easy to start, hard to put down, an entrancing mix of intriguing puzzles with a simple user interface
 
INNOVATIVE TOUCH CONTROLS
A tactile experience so natural you can almost feel the surface of each object
 
REALISTIC 3D LOCATIONS
Immerse yourself in a variety of stunning environments which will challenge your puzzle solving prowess. 
 
DETAILED 3D OBJECTS
Pore over the intricate details of dozens of artifacts in search of their hidden secrets.
 
UNNERVING AUDIO
A haunting soundtrack and dynamic sound effects create a soundscape that reacts to your play.
 
iCLOUD & GAMECENTER NOW SUPPORTED 
Share your progress between multiple devices, and unlock the all-new achievements.
 
MULTI LANGUAGE SUPPORT
Available in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish & Brazilian Portuguese.

*******************************************************************************************************************
 
Fireproof Games is a small independent studio based in Guildford in the United Kingdom.
Find out more at fireproofgames.com
Follow us @Fireproof_Games

us.description:
Halls of Torment is a horde survival game with a pre-rendered retro look reminiscent of RPGs from the late 90s. Choose one of many hero characters and descend into the deadly Halls of Torment. Fight unholy horrors from beyond and survive wave after wave of enemies until you face one of the tormented Lords. 

Strengthen your hero with character traits, abilities, and items. Create a new powerful build during each run. Explore various underground expanses and find new powerful items that enable you to venture even deeper into the abyss.

First available on Steam, the 90's-style RPG survival roguelike, Halls of Torment, is now making its debut on mobile!

【Features】
◆ Quick and casual 30 minute runs
◆ Old school pre-rendered art style
◆ Quest-based meta progression
◆ Large selection of diverse abilities, traits, and items, all enabling you to create interesting synergies
◆ Diverse bosses featuring unique mechanics and attack patterns
◆ Several distinct characters allowing for many different play styles
◆ Unlock and explore multiple interesting and challenging underground worlds
◆ Unique items can be sent up to the overworld and used to customize future runs
◆ Craft magical tinctures to direct fate in your favor
◆ Unlock the power of each class and combine them with your chosen character
◆ Find rare item variants to further improve your builds

【Full Content List】
◆6 stages with unique environments
◆12 playable characters & character marks
◆25 blessings that make you stronger for each run
◆68 unique items to retrieve and unlock
◆240 higher rarity item variants
◆80+ abilities and ability upgrades
◆40+ artifacts to customize your game experience
◆35+ unique bosses
◆70+ unique monsters
◆500 quests to complete
◆1000+ traits that upgrade characters and abilities

Our content list is still growing, expect more in the future!

Email: prglobal@erabitstudios.com

us.description:
【Game Introduction】
'Call of Knights' is an RPG card pixel-style game developed by Olive Panda Studio. It is divided into two parts: 'Song of the Knight' and 'Shining Stars,' each offering unique gameplay and content. The game adopts paid download, in-app purchase to unlock model to access all gameplay content.

【In-App Purchases Unlock】
Full Content Unlock: $8.99 USD
Story Mode of Song of the Knight: $4.99 USD
Free Mode of Shining Stars: $4.99 USD
Both modes support experiencing before paying for unlocking. 'Song of the Knight' can be experienced for free until the end of the second chapter, and 'Shining Stars' offers free gameplay for one year. 
Note: The amounts will be converted based on the local exchange rate.

'Song of the Knight':
The story is adapted from the Nobel Prize-winning author Henrik Hien's 'The Knights of the Cross.' The main gameplay involves RPG role-playing with cards, incorporating a partner skill combo system during card battles. Different cards played release exclusive skills, constructing various playstyles. Players will also meet and recruit numerous companions, embarking on an epic journey.

'Shining Stars':
The game is set in a magical continent called Antana, featuring six countries with diverse customs. Players take on the role of a small lord in one of the kingdoms. As the demonic realm is about to invade the continent, players must travel far and wide to find companions for their knightly order, establish their own knightly order, embark on adventures, strengthen their abilities, and defend the human frontlines.

【Device Support】
· iOS 10.0 and above
· Operating memory of 3GB and above
· iPhone 7 and above
· iPad Air 3 and above

【Contact Us】
If you need assistance during the game or encounter issues, feel free to contact us via email.
Official Email: knight@longyougame.com

*** Winner of Apple Design Award 2019 ***

Thumper is rhythm violence: classic action, blistering speed, and brutal physicality. You are a space beetle. Brave the void and confront a maniacal giant head.

With this special pocket edition, you can play all nine epic levels with one hand.

Hurtle forward, master new moves, and survive terrifying boss battles. Propelled by a pounding original soundtrack, you'll feel every crushing impact. To reach synesthetic bliss, you must conquer rhythm hell.

■ Features ■
・ Nine epic levels
・ Adrenalizing boss battles
・ Psychedelic visuals and original soundtrack
・ Smooth 60 FPS in portrait and landscape (and up to 120 FPS on supported devices)
・ PLAY + mode (increased challenge and speed)
・ Full screen display on iPhone X
・ iCloud Sync

■ Please Note ■
Wireless headphones can add significant audio latency. For the best experience, wired headphones or integrated speakers are strongly recommended.

us.description:
Otaku’s Adventure is a unique anime-style AVG that tells the story of an Otaku who has been single since birth and craves to be loved. After the romantic encounter with three charming girls, your life will take an unexpected turn: to go on a run-away adventure with Waifu, an outer-space journey with Gohard, or an exploration in a fantasy world with (´･ω･`). 

- Kick start your thrilling and romantic adventure and release your Otaku energy!
- Unlock 35+ endings following three different routes
- Use your wit to solve the ingenious puzzles and beat a collection of funny mini-games ranging from shooting games to turn-based RPG combat

Join Alto and his friends as they embark on an endless snowboarding odyssey. Journey across the beautiful alpine hills of their native wilderness, through neighbouring villages, ancient woodlands, and long-abandoned ruins.

Along the way you'll rescue runaway llamas, grind rooftops, leap over terrifying chasms and outwit the mountain elders – all while braving the ever changing elements and passage of time upon the mountain.

Features:

• Fluid, graceful and exhilarating physics-based gameplay

• Procedurally generated terrain based on real-world snowboarding

• Fully dynamic lighting and weather effects, including thunderstorms, blizzards, fog, rainbows, shooting stars, and more

• Easy to learn, difficult to master one button trick system

• Chain together combos to maximize points and speed

• Test your skills with 180 handcrafted goals

• Discover six unique snowboarders, each with their own special attributes and abilities

• Challenge your friends with Game Center. Compete for best high score, best distance, and best trick combo!

• Acquire the wingsuit from Izel’s workshop for an entirely new gameplay dynamic

• Beautifully minimalist and evocative visual design

• Original music and handcrafted audio for an ambient and immersive experience (headphones recommended!)

• Universal app with iCloud support. Play on your iPhone and iPad and your progress will always be in sync.

Alto’s Adventure is a premium game with no ads or in-app purchases.

us.description:
Codenames is a clever word game of deduction, teamwork, and strategy, inspired by the popular board game loved worldwide.


Give one-word clues, link multiple words, and read your teammates’ minds to win before the other team does.


Easy to learn, hard to master
Codenames is simple to understand and instantly rewarding. Every match tests your logic, creativity, and intuition — a perfect blend of casual fun and deep thinking.

Play at your own pace
Turn-based matches let you play whenever you want, as much as you want. Start several games at once and return when it’s your turn — perfect for busy players.

Smart fun for sharp minds
If you enjoy games that make you think, this is for you. Every clue and guess matters — there’s no autoplay, no idle waiting, just pure wordplay and deduction.

Why players love Codenames
 • Turn-based multiplayer — play with friends or online opponents.
 • Based on a beloved board game concept: give one-word clues, guess multiple words.
 • Exclusive twists and new game modes available exclusively in this version.
 • Choose your role — Spymaster or Operative — and master both perspectives.
 • One-time purchase unlocks a full experience — no freemium grind, no intrusive ads—just the pure enjoyment for the price of a cup of coffee for the dev team.

Join millions of players and test how well you can get into the minds of others.
Download Codenames today — the top multiplayer word game for clever thinkers.

us.releaseNotes: Hello explorers! We're happy to let you know that we have updated Alto's Odyssey. This update introduces a handful of UI improvements and minor UI bug fixes that ought to make your journey through the endless desert a smoother one. Catch you on the other side of the dunes!
us.description:
Just beyond the horizon sits a majestic desert, vast and unexplored.

“Apple Design Award Winner, 2018”
– Apple

“The art of the perfect sequel”
– The Verge

“A true joy”
– TechCrunch

“Dramatic and driving”
– Kotaku

“A beautiful labor of love”
– The Next Web

“Vibrant and poetic”
– MacStories

“Gorgeous”
– Engadget

“Incredibly beautiful”
– TouchArcade

“Dazzling”
– Macworld

“A relaxing experience”
– Ars Technica

Join Alto and his friends and set off on an endless sandboarding journey to discover its secrets.

Soar above windswept dunes, traverse thrilling canyons, and explore long-hidden temples in a fantastical place far from home.

Along the way, you’ll grind across vines, bounce atop hot air balloons, ride towering rock walls, and escape mischievous lemurs – all while uncovering the desert’s many mysteries. 

Features:

• A standalone experience. Alto’s Odyssey is the follow-up to the critically acclaimed Alto’s Adventure, but you don’t need to have played one to enjoy the other.

• Easy to learn, difficult to master. At the heart of the Alto series is an elegant one-touch trick system. Chain together combos, and complete 180 goals —  all with intuitive controls.

• Explore Biomes. From the dunes, to the canyons, to the temples, explore a rich and diverse landscape, with each area boasting unique visuals and gameplay.  

• Newfound heights. Discover secrets in the sky with hot-air balloons, moving grind rails, and wall riding.

• Master the elements. In addition to dynamic lighting and weather effects like sandstorms and shooting stars, the desert is home to swirling wind vortexes and rushing water.

• Meet Alto and friends. Unlock six unique characters, each with their own attributes and abilities.

• Zen Mode. Complete with its own serene soundtrack, this relaxing mode distills Odyssey down to its purest elements: no scores, no coins, and no power-ups. Just you and the endless desert. 

• Photo Mode. From the pause screen, get behind the lens and take stunning photos of your trip through the desert. Pinch, swipe, pan and zoom to frame the ideal shot, and share them with friends and family.

• Original music and handcrafted audio. Headphones recommended!

• Universal app with iCloud support. Play on your iPhone, iPad, and Apple TV, and your progress will always be in sync.

Alto’s Odyssey is a premium game with no ads or in-app purchases. Purchase once, play forever.

us.description:
"Catan", the legendary strategy game provides gaming fun anytime, anywhere.

True to the original game, you can compete with up to four players for the most settlements, the longest roads and the largest army. You can trade with each other and claim the precious land with all its resources.

The game allows you to challenge other Catan fans online via cross-platform multiplayer to prove your strategy skills or play against the AI:
Various computer opponents, each with their own individual characteristics, will prove themselves worthy competitors: the pirate Jean, who knows no compromise, Vincent the merchant, who never allows himself to be cheated, Sean the knight, who takes what is rightfully his...

The popular Catan expansions "Seafarers", "Cities and Knights" and two new special scenarios are available as In-App purchases.

The complete Seafarers expansion includes more than 10 additional scenarios with an extensive campaign. Become Harbormaster, discover new islands and extra game elements like ships, gold fields, treasures and pirates. Ahoy!

The Cities and Knights expansion introduces various new gameplay mechanics that add even more variety to Catan. Invest new trade goods in city improvements to build one of the three metropolises of Catan – but beware of the barbarians attracted by Catan’s new wealth! You’ll need your best knights to fend them off! C&K contains a short campaign and 7 challenging maps.

Exciting adventures await you in the two new scenarios "Enchanted Land" and "The Great Canal". Vanquish dragons and bag their treasures or build a canal to help barren grain fields bloom once more.

Features:

- Available languages: English, German, French, Dutch, Spanish, Portuguese, Japanese
- Original "Settlers of Catan" rule set
- Update 4.0+: Synchronous online multiplayer games
- Smart computer opponents with individual strategies
- Scrollable game board including zoom option 
- Freely combinable game settings 
- Game statistics
- Comprehensive tutorial
- Seafarers LITE: New scenario "The 4 Islands" and two additional game variants
- Cities and Knights LITE: Test the new expansion in the scenario “The first Island”
- 3 different graphic sets to choose from


***** 
Catan FAQ: 

Question: An expansion seems gone after an update or reinstallation of Catan or after restoring the device? 
Answer: Don’t worry! Your initial purchase is already saved in your iTunes account. You can restore your InApp purchases by selecting the restore-option in the Catan IAP menu. 

Question: I lost my campaign progress after reinstalling, updating or restoring my device. Is there any way to restore it? 
Answer: When saved games can’t be automatically restored, we’ve integrated a cheat code: In the campaign mode go to select player and enter „CatanWarp*“ (* = 1–15) as your player name and confirm. Exit the game via the home button and restart it. The campaign can now be continued from the specified level number (1–15). Levels up to the specified number will be unlocked in the custom game mode as well. 

Question: Are dice rolls really random? 
Answer: Of course! All dice rolls are 100% random and not modified in any way. We’re avid Catan players ourselves. We’ve played the iOS version hundreds of times while developing the program. There have been times when we won and lost a few games in a row because of the dice - just like when playing the board game! 

*****
Questions or suggestions for improvements: 
Mail to ios@usm.de 
We are looking forward to your feedback! 

For more information on news and updates: www.usmgames.com 
or visit us on www.facebook.com/UnitedSoftMedia and twitter.com/USM_News 

*****

us.description:
Klei Entertainment has partnered with our friends at CAPY, creators of Superbrothers: Sword and Sworcery, Super Time Force and Below; to bring fans of Don’t Starve the latest single-player expansion: Don’t Starve: Shipwrecked!

In Don't Starve: Shipwrecked, Wilson finds himself stranded in a tropical archipelago. He must learn to survive all over again in this new environment filled with new biomes, seasons, and creatures.

Don’t let the tropical breeze lull you into a false sense of security - the world might be different, but it is still equal parts unforgiving and uncompromising. You will quickly find these islands are full to the brim with things that want to kill you.

Key Features:

Navigate the Open Ocean: Craft a boat and set sail for adventure! 

Explore an Entirely New World: The entire world is different. Explore new biomes filled with new resources. Scavenge for new sources of food. Run for your life from a host of new creatures. 

Brave New Seasons: A set of tropically inspired seasons will try their hardest to kill you. 

Craft New Recipes: Build an array of new gadgets to help yourself survive these harsh islands.

To celebrate our 9-year anniversary as Rusty Lake, we’ve added a connection between Underground Blossom and The Past Within in the form of a secret mini-game. Check out our platforms to see how to establish a connection between The Past and The Future and unlock this secret mini-game in The Past Within.

us.description:
Note: The Past Within is a co-op only game. Both players need to own a copy of the game on their own device (mobile, tablet or computer), as well as a way to communicate with each other. Play together with a friend or find a partner on our official Discord server!

The past and future cannot be explored alone! Team up with a friend and piece together the mysteries surrounding Albert Vanderboom. Communicate what you see around you to help one another solve various puzzles and explore the worlds from different perspectives! 

The Past Within is the first co-op only point-and-click adventure set in the mysterious world of Rusty Lake.

Features:

▪ A co-op experience 
Play together with a friend, one in The Past, the other in The Future. Work together to solve the puzzles and help Rose set her father’s plan in motion!
▪ Two worlds - Two perspectives 
Both players will experience their environments in two different dimensions: 2D as well as in 3D - a first-time experience in the Rusty Lake universe!
▪ Cross-platform
As long as you can communicate with each other, you and your partner of choice can each play The Past Within on your preferred platform: Mac, PC and Nintendo Switch!
▪ Playtime & Replayability
The game contains 2 chapters and has an average play-time of 2 hours. For the full experience, we recommend replaying the game from the other perspective. Plus you can use our replayability feature for a fresh start with new solutions to all puzzles.

Travel from station to station, each metro stop symbolising a piece of Laura's past and future. Solve various puzzles, find the correct metro to board and uncover one of Laura’s timelines, while simultaneously helping her make sense of her life and escape the corruption of her mind!

Underground Blossom is a new point-and-click adventure developed by the creators of the Cube Escape & Rusty Lake series.

Features:

▪ A new experience in a familiar setting
Enjoy a classic Rusty Lake point-and-click puzzle adventure with a gripping story full of mysteries and, of course, puzzles.

▪ Expect to make several stops
Travel to 7 unique metro stations, each station a representation of Laura Vanderboom’s life, memories and potential future. The estimated travel time is 2 hours.

▪ You know what to do
Unravel the potential secrets hidden in each metro station, earn achievements and who knows what else you might stumble upon!

▪ Don’t forget your headphones
At each metro stop you will be greeted by an atmospheric soundtrack by Victor Butzelaar, including a cello performance by Sebastiaan van Halsema!

us.description:
A desperate letter summons detective Paul Trilby to a peculiar island town, divided by a wall and ruled by a Hospital. Regular citizens get admitted and then return without their memories. A sinister conspiracy is afoot. Can you get to the bottom of this mystery?

us.description:
WHAT IS ScanGo?
ScanGo is a little, simple, flexible, easy-to-use app with kinds of features satisfying different situations in your iPhone. It allows you to scan documents, certificates, credit cards, invoices, receipts, tickets and any paper with high quality image & PDF output. Also, you can extract text by OCR function from any scans just by one tap.
It is also a camera scanner with concise, efficient user interface whose main tone is black & white with teal & chrome yellow embellished throughout the app. 

HOW TO SCAN DOCS?
- Scan everything by one click, of course you can choose to scan from Photos or Camera.
- Edit docs after scanning immediately, including add, rotate, adjust, reorder and delete pages.
- Rotate, Crop and Adjust filter to get high quality scans.
- Provided five filter modes to enhance your scans - Original, B&W 1, B&W 2, Color, Grayscale. What’s more, each filter can be adjusted for its own Brightness, Contrast, Saturation and Sharpness.

HOW TO MANAGE DOCS?
- The Recents module on home page shows your recently added docs, which helps to find them faster.
- Add folders and sub-folders to manage scanned docs.
- Rename folders and documents to make them more distinguishable.
- Important and urgent documents can be Starred for faster access.
- Search function helps to find the doc you need from a dizzying array.
- Every folder, doc and page can be shared with email, Dropbox, Google Drive, Evernote etc. or Wifi directly.
- Save scans as JPEG to Photos.
- Move/Copy/Delete docs and pages.
- Print scans directly within app once you connect to a Printer.
- Fax scans directly if you have Fax Pro app installed.

AFRAID OF DATA LOSS?
ScanGo supports syncing data with iCloud. 

MAKE THE APP MORE EFFICIENT
CONVENIENT - Turn on the camera immediately whenever you open the app.
HANDY - Save scans to Photos automatically.
EASY - Auto edge detection and enhancement.
SIMPLE - Share docs and folders in default PDF size.
SECURE - Protect your documents with passcode.

MORE QUESTIONS?
If you have any problems with ScanGo, please email us at scango@beesoft.io, we’ll help to figure it out asap.

us.description:
Cyber Manhunt is a Cyber-Style, Realistic- Society theme, Story-Rich indie game. The game taked place in the Republic of Alivia with some different theme stories ,but the fate of the characters is closely related in there. It will focus on social issues liking big data, hacking, citizen privacy etc... 

We want to reveal the profound themes behind the stories with wonderful plots and gamification. And let players pay more attention to Cyber Violence and Privacy Breaches.

[Contents]
◆Chapter I: Death of a Programmer
The CEO of a company committed suicide by jumping off a building, and claimed that he was extorted tens of millions by his wife. While his wife posted photos of domestic violence on social networks. Who is lying?
◆Chapter II: Invisible Eyes
The indecent video of the female college student went viral on the Internet. At this moment, she was already socially dead. Who is the initiator? Who should protect the safety of women?
◆Chapter III: The Evidence Vanishes
The student council president, who is both excellent in character and study, suddenly disappeared. The bullying incident made the case more complicated. Who is the murderer and who is the victim?
◆Chapter IV: The Price of Humiliation
The female singer has been exposed again! Threatening letters, hype, the suicide of former girl group members... The Internet has set off a public opinion carnival again!
◆Chapter V: Immortal Code
When the society is in madness, are you willing to join the Immortal Code to obtain true love and immortality?
◆DLC: Home Sweet Home
Behind this seemingly sweet and happy family, everyone has their own secrets, what is the truth hidden behind?!
◆DLC: Hello World!
Senior researcher of Titan Dr. Lucrezia died in a terrible car accident on the spot, but the fellow Benjamin took escape from death. But he did not realize that he was about to be involved in a huge conspiracy…

[Features]
◆Highly Immersive: Gamers play as a hacker in the game, accepts the commission of the company, and solve dangerous incidents.
◆Rich Gameplay: There are lots of features of Social Engineering in the game, which is including Detecting, Tracking, Puzzles-Solving, Destroying and Hacking etc..
◆Wonderful Plots: Each chapter in the game will reflect a current hot social topic, such as: Sneak Shot, Cyber Violence, School Bullying, etc...
◆Multiple Roles: There are many different roles in this game with a flash of personality. Their stories would be dug by yourself.
◆Fully Dubbing: All the characters in the game have their own voice actors that make the game experience more immersive.
◆Original Music: There are some original songs in the game, and the lyrics and vocals are all completed by the studio.

[Gameplay]
◆Web Search: You should collect basic information about the targets through the Internet search.
◆Database: You can use the database to get deep information about targets.
◆Crack: You would get passwords based on the obtained target's information, and use it to log in to accounts of different platforms.
◆Chat: The exciting thing is that you need to chat with targets by disguise and use the information to get the trust of the target.
◆Phishing: You can send phishing links to hack the targets' hardware devices, and get private information.
◆Picture Analysis: You can get valuable information and relevant clues from pictures.
More advanced hacking methods will be unlocked later!

us.description:
Available exclusively on the App Store, meticulously designed to be beautifully powerful, and painstakingly engineered for iPad — Inspire Pro delivers an incredibly fast and realistic painting, drawing, and sketching experience that you can take with you wherever you go and use whenever inspiration strikes.

Our proprietary painting engine Sorcery™ takes full advantage of the GPU to render brush strokes with brilliant 64-bit color, laser-sharp sub-pixel precision, and insanely fast speed. While the strokes of a wet oil paint brush look beautiful on their own, the breathtaking blending effects of a dry brush will absolutely stun you. Graze the canvas with just a bit of pressure to add a subtle blur to your artwork or use stronger pressure to actually mix existing colors on the canvas together to create new ones.

Whether you are a budding artist, seasoned professional, or somewhere in-between, you will enjoy the simplicity and power of the most intuitive and compelling illustration app for iPad, Inspire Pro.

Amazing Brushes
• 150 high quality brushes to choose from, divided into 15 sets: Oil Paint, Airbrushes, Spray Paint, Paint Splatter, Graphite Pencils, Wax Crayons, Markers, Chalk, Charcoal, Pastels & Conté, Basic Shapes, Complex Shapes, Shape Outlines, Patterns, and Textures
• All brushes can be used as a Wet Brush, Dry Brush (Blending), or Eraser
• Over 20 different settings are available to customize brush strokes with powerful versatility and variation

The Best Painting App for iPad
• Sorcery™, the fastest 64-bit painting engine on the App Store
• Full-fledged Apple Pencil support for pressure, tilt angle, orientation, and double-tap
• Smart Keyboard support with over 20 context-sensitive keyboard shortcuts
• Create a canvas of any size up to 16K (64MP) on iPad Pro
• Dual-texture brushes
• 64-bit color
• All device orientations are supported all the time — switch from portrait to landscape painting with ease
• 1000 levels of undo and redo are available
• Touch and slide hotspots can be used to quickly change brush size, opacity, and pressure without opening a menu
• The eyedropper tool can be used with a touch and hold gesture to select paint colors from the canvas
• The canvas can be moved around, rotated, and zoomed in and out up to 6400%

Canvas Playback Video Recording
• Brush strokes are automatically recorded as you paint without any delay
• You can play the video of your artwork being created stroke-by-stroke directly in the gallery
• Exported videos are high quality HD at up to 1080p resolution

Full-Featured Color Picker
• Choose any paint color you can dream of with the intuitive color picker
• HSB and RGB sliders accompany a large color circle, color square, and opacity slider
• Your latest colors are saved to a palette automatically while you paint
• You can also save your favorite colors to a palette with drag and drop

Visit snowCanoe.com to check out more screenshots, videos, and artwork.

us.description:
Plan sun and moon positions before you arrive. Predict golden hour, moonrise, and light direction—plus widgets that keep key times visible at a glance.

Know where the light will be—before you go.

Solar Arc is a sun and moon planning tool built for people who care about timing, direction, and alignment. Instead of guessing or arriving too late, you can predict exactly how light will move across a location—hours or days in advance.

Whether you’re scouting, planning a shoot, or timing a sunset or moonrise, Solar Arc gives you clarity before you commit.

--

Plan with Precision

• Live Sun & Moon Arc Visualization
See real-time solar and lunar paths with compass-based direction.

• Golden Hour & Blue Hour Forecasts
Know the precise windows when light is at its best.

• Moonrise & Moonset Planning
Track lunar timing and position for night and landscape work.

• Forecasting & Location Planning
Preview sun and moon paths for any date, anywhere.

• Offline Access
All core planning tools work without a connection in the field.

tr.description:
Window seat or aisle? Booth or table? Lone wolf or life of the party? In Is This Seat Taken?, your mission is to organize groups of people according to their preferences. It’s a cozy, no-pressure logic puzzle game where you’re in charge of who sits where.

Whether it’s the cinema, a crowded bus, a wedding reception, or a cramped taxi cab, every setting introduces new characters with specific tastes. A party guest with a sensitive nose won’t be happy sitting next to a stranger who’s wearing too much cologne. A sleepy passenger won’t be happy trying to nap on the bus next to someone listening to loud music. It’s all about reading the room to find the perfect placement!

Nat is an aspiring actor whose world gets turned upside down when they see a shape just like them on the big screen. This discovery sends Nat on a global journey to meet their hero and figure out how to fit in. Experience Nat's heartfelt story as you travel from city to city, each with its own levels, characters, and charm.

- Play seating matchmaker to please picky characters.
- Discover each character’s unique traits—relatable, outlandish, and everything in between.
- Piece together satisfying puzzles with no timers or leaderboards.
- Unlock fun new scenarios as you progress—from bus rides to banquets!

tr.description:

Compete for first place in the leaderboards with daily and weekly challenges.
Will you master the art of rally?

Experience the golden era of rally in Career mode, traveling across 78 stages from Finland to Sardinia, Norway, Japan, Germany, Kenya and Indonesia.

Get behind the wheel of your favorite vintage cars, ranging from the 60’s to the 80’s, Group B, Group S and Group A.

From beginner-friendly options to driving modes that’ll challenge the most expert drivers, all players can tackle the races using their favorite rally driving tricks: Scandinavian flick, counter steering, left foot braking, handbrake turns.

Get your name out at the top of the Leaderboard in our daily and weekly challenges.

Show off your driving skills, or simply your favourite landscapes, with the integrated Photo and Replay mode.

tr.description:
Halls of Torment is a horde survival game with a pre-rendered retro look reminiscent of RPGs from the late 90s. Choose one of many hero characters and descend into the deadly Halls of Torment. Fight unholy horrors from beyond and survive wave after wave of enemies until you face one of the tormented Lords. 

Strengthen your hero with character traits, abilities, and items. Create a new powerful build during each run. Explore various underground expanses and find new powerful items that enable you to venture even deeper into the abyss.

First available on Steam, the 90's-style RPG survival roguelike, Halls of Torment, is now making its debut on mobile!

【Features】
◆ Quick and casual 30 minute runs
◆ Old school pre-rendered art style
◆ Quest-based meta progression
◆ Large selection of diverse abilities, traits, and items, all enabling you to create interesting synergies
◆ Diverse bosses featuring unique mechanics and attack patterns
◆ Several distinct characters allowing for many different play styles
◆ Unlock and explore multiple interesting and challenging underground worlds
◆ Unique items can be sent up to the overworld and used to customize future runs

◆80+ abilities and ability upgrades

Our content list is still growing, expect more in the future!

tr.description:
【Game Introduction】
'Call of Knights' is an RPG card pixel-style game developed by Olive Panda Studio. It is divided into two parts: 'Song of the Knight' and 'Shining Stars,' each offering unique gameplay and content. The game adopts paid download, in-app purchase to unlock model to access all gameplay content.

【In-App Purchases Unlock】
Full Content Unlock: $8.99 USD
Story Mode of Song of the Knight: $4.99 USD
Free Mode of Shining Stars: $4.99 USD
Both modes support experiencing before paying for unlocking. 'Song of the Knight' can be experienced for free until the end of the second chapter, and 'Shining Stars' offers free gameplay for one year. 
Note: The amounts will be converted based on the local exchange rate.

'Song of the Knight':
The story is adapted from the Nobel Prize-winning author Henrik Hien's 'The Knights of the Cross.' The main gameplay involves RPG role-playing with cards, incorporating a partner skill combo system during card battles. Different cards played release exclusive skills, constructing various playstyles. Players will also meet and recruit numerous companions, embarking on an epic journey.

'Shining Stars':
The game is set in a magical continent called Antana, featuring six countries with diverse customs. Players take on the role of a small lord in one of the kingdoms. As the demonic realm is about to invade the continent, players must travel far and wide to find companions for their knightly order, establish their own knightly order, embark on adventures, strengthen their abilities, and defend the human frontlines.

【Device Support】
· iOS 10.0 and above
· Operating memory of 3GB and above
· iPhone 7 and above
· iPad Air 3 and above

【Contact Us】
If you need assistance during the game or encounter issues, feel free to contact us via email.
Official Email: knight@longyougame.com

Join Alto and his friends as they embark on an endless snowboarding odyssey. Journey across the beautiful alpine hills of their native wilderness, through neighbouring villages, ancient woodlands, and long-abandoned ruins.

Along the way you'll rescue runaway llamas, grind rooftops, leap over terrifying chasms and outwit the mountain elders – all while braving the ever changing elements and passage of time upon the mountain.

Features:

• Fluid, graceful and exhilarating physics-based gameplay

• Procedurally generated terrain based on real-world snowboarding

• Fully dynamic lighting and weather effects, including thunderstorms, blizzards, fog, rainbows, shooting stars, and more

• Easy to learn, difficult to master one button trick system

• Chain together combos to maximize points and speed

• Test your skills with 180 handcrafted goals

• Discover six unique snowboarders, each with their own special attributes and abilities

• Challenge your friends with Game Center. Compete for best high score, best distance, and best trick combo!

• Acquire the wingsuit from Izel’s workshop for an entirely new gameplay dynamic

• Beautifully minimalist and evocative visual design

• Original music and handcrafted audio for an ambient and immersive experience (headphones recommended!)

• Universal app with iCloud support. Play on your iPhone and iPad and your progress will always be in sync.

Alto’s Adventure is a premium game with no ads or in-app purchases.

tr.description:
Codenames is a clever word game of deduction, teamwork, and strategy, inspired by the popular board game loved worldwide.


Give one-word clues, link multiple words, and read your teammates’ minds to win before the other team does.


Easy to learn, hard to master
Codenames is simple to understand and instantly rewarding. Every match tests your logic, creativity, and intuition — a perfect blend of casual fun and deep thinking.

Play at your own pace
Turn-based matches let you play whenever you want, as much as you want. Start several games at once and return when it’s your turn — perfect for busy players.

Smart fun for sharp minds
If you enjoy games that make you think, this is for you. Every clue and guess matters — there’s no autoplay, no idle waiting, just pure wordplay and deduction.

Why players love Codenames
 • Turn-based multiplayer — play with friends or online opponents.
 • Based on a beloved board game concept: give one-word clues, guess multiple words.
 • Exclusive twists and new game modes available exclusively in this version.
 • Choose your role — Spymaster or Operative — and master both perspectives.
 • One-time purchase unlocks a full experience — no freemium grind, no intrusive ads—just the pure enjoyment for the price of a cup of coffee for the dev team.

Join millions of players and test how well you can get into the minds of others.
Download Codenames today — the top multiplayer word game for clever thinkers.

“Vibrant and poetic”
– MacStories

“Gorgeous”
– Engadget

“Incredibly beautiful”
– TouchArcade

“Dazzling”
– Macworld

“A relaxing experience”
– Ars Technica

Join Alto and his friends and set off on an endless sandboarding journey to discover its secrets.

Soar above windswept dunes, traverse thrilling canyons, and explore long-hidden temples in a fantastical place far from home.

Along the way, you’ll grind across vines, bounce atop hot air balloons, ride towering rock walls, and escape mischievous lemurs – all while uncovering the desert’s many mysteries. 

Features:

• A standalone experience. Alto’s Odyssey is the follow-up to the critically acclaimed Alto’s Adventure, but you don’t need to have played one to enjoy the other.

• Easy to learn, difficult to master. At the heart of the Alto series is an elegant one-touch trick system. Chain together combos, and complete 180 goals —  all with intuitive controls.

• Explore Biomes. From the dunes, to the canyons, to the temples, explore a rich and diverse landscape, with each area boasting unique visuals and gameplay.  

• Newfound heights. Discover secrets in the sky with hot-air balloons, moving grind rails, and wall riding.

• Master the elements. In addition to dynamic lighting and weather effects like sandstorms and shooting stars, the desert is home to swirling wind vortexes and rushing water.

• Meet Alto and friends. Unlock six unique characters, each with their own attributes and abilities.

• Zen Mode. Complete with its own serene soundtrack, this relaxing mode distills Odyssey down to its purest elements: no scores, no coins, and no power-ups. Just you and the endless desert. 

• Photo Mode. From the pause screen, get behind the lens and take stunning photos of your trip through the desert. Pinch, swipe, pan and zoom to frame the ideal shot, and share them with friends and family.

• Original music and handcrafted audio. Headphones recommended!

• Universal app with iCloud support. Play on your iPhone, iPad, and Apple TV, and your progress will always be in sync.

Alto’s Odyssey is a premium game with no ads or in-app purchases. Purchase once, play forever.

tr.description:
"Catan", the legendary strategy game provides gaming fun anytime, anywhere.

True to the original game, you can compete with up to four players for the most settlements, the longest roads and the largest army. You can trade with each other and claim the precious land with all its resources.

The game allows you to challenge other Catan fans online via cross-platform multiplayer to prove your strategy skills or play against the AI:
Various computer opponents, each with their own individual characteristics, will prove themselves worthy competitors: the pirate Jean, who knows no compromise, Vincent the merchant, who never allows himself to be cheated, Sean the knight, who takes what is rightfully his...

The popular Catan expansions "Seafarers", "Cities and Knights" and two new special scenarios are available as In-App purchases.

The complete Seafarers expansion includes more than 10 additional scenarios with an extensive campaign. Become Harbormaster, discover new islands and extra game elements like ships, gold fields, treasures and pirates. Ahoy!

The Cities and Knights expansion introduces various new gameplay mechanics that add even more variety to Catan. Invest new trade goods in city improvements to build one of the three metropolises of Catan – but beware of the barbarians attracted by Catan’s new wealth! You’ll need your best knights to fend them off! C&K contains a short campaign and 7 challenging maps.

Exciting adventures await you in the two new scenarios "Enchanted Land" and "The Great Canal". Vanquish dragons and bag their treasures or build a canal to help barren grain fields bloom once more.

Features:

- Available languages: English, German, French, Dutch, Spanish, Portuguese, Japanese
- Original "Settlers of Catan" rule set
- Update 4.0+: Synchronous online multiplayer games
- Smart computer opponents with individual strategies
- Scrollable game board including zoom option 
- Freely combinable game settings 
- Game statistics
- Comprehensive tutorial
- Seafarers LITE: New scenario "The 4 Islands" and two additional game variants
- Cities and Knights LITE: Test the new expansion in the scenario “The first Island”
- 3 different graphic sets to choose from


***** 
Catan FAQ: 

Question: An expansion seems gone after an update or reinstallation of Catan or after restoring the device? 
Answer: Don’t worry! Your initial purchase is already saved in your iTunes account. You can restore your InApp purchases by selecting the restore-option in the Catan IAP menu. 

Question: I lost my campaign progress after reinstalling, updating or restoring my device. Is there any way to restore it? 
Answer: When saved games can’t be automatically restored, we’ve integrated a cheat code: In the campaign mode go to select player and enter „CatanWarp*“ (* = 1–15) as your player name and confirm. Exit the game via the home button and restart it. The campaign can now be continued from the specified level number (1–15). Levels up to the specified number will be unlocked in the custom game mode as well. 

Question: Are dice rolls really random? 
Answer: Of course! All dice rolls are 100% random and not modified in any way. We’re avid Catan players ourselves. We’ve played the iOS version hundreds of times while developing the program. There have been times when we won and lost a few games in a row because of the dice - just like when playing the board game! 

*****
Questions or suggestions for improvements: 
Mail to ios@usm.de 
We are looking forward to your feedback! 

For more information on news and updates: www.usmgames.com 
or visit us on www.facebook.com/UnitedSoftMedia and twitter.com/USM_News 

*****

tr.description:
Klei Entertainment has partnered with our friends at CAPY, creators of Superbrothers: Sword and Sworcery, Super Time Force and Below; to bring fans of Don’t Starve the latest single-player expansion: Don’t Starve: Shipwrecked!

In Don't Starve: Shipwrecked, Wilson finds himself stranded in a tropical archipelago. He must learn to survive all over again in this new environment filled with new biomes, seasons, and creatures.

Don’t let the tropical breeze lull you into a false sense of security - the world might be different, but it is still equal parts unforgiving and uncompromising. You will quickly find these islands are full to the brim with things that want to kill you.

Key Features:

Navigate the Open Ocean: Craft a boat and set sail for adventure! 

Explore an Entirely New World: The entire world is different. Explore new biomes filled with new resources. Scavenge for new sources of food. Run for your life from a host of new creatures. 

Brave New Seasons: A set of tropically inspired seasons will try their hardest to kill you. 

Craft New Recipes: Build an array of new gadgets to help yourself survive these harsh islands.

tr.description:
Note: The Past Within is a co-op only game. Both players need to own a copy of the game on their own device (mobile, tablet or computer), as well as a way to communicate with each other. Play together with a friend or find a partner on our official Discord server!

The past and future cannot be explored alone! Team up with a friend and piece together the mysteries surrounding Albert Vanderboom. Communicate what you see around you to help one another solve various puzzles and explore the worlds from different perspectives! 

The Past Within is the first co-op only point-and-click adventure set in the mysterious world of Rusty Lake.

Features:

▪ A co-op experience 
Play together with a friend, one in The Past, the other in The Future. Work together to solve the puzzles and help Rose set her father’s plan in motion!
▪ Two worlds - Two perspectives 
Both players will experience their environments in two different dimensions: 2D as well as in 3D - a first-time experience in the Rusty Lake universe!
▪ Cross-platform
As long as you can communicate with each other, you and your partner of choice can each play The Past Within on your preferred platform: Mac, PC and Nintendo Switch!
▪ Playtime & Replayability
The game contains 2 chapters and has an average play-time of 2 hours. For the full experience, we recommend replaying the game from the other perspective. Plus you can use our replayability feature for a fresh start with new solutions to all puzzles.

Descend into the Rusty Lake Underground and travel through the life and memories of Laura Vanderboom!

Features:

▪ A new experience in a familiar setting
Enjoy a classic Rusty Lake point-and-click puzzle adventure with a gripping story full of mysteries and, of course, puzzles.

▪ Expect to make several stops
Travel to 7 unique metro stations, each station a representation of Laura Vanderboom’s life, memories and potential future. The estimated travel time is 2 hours.

▪ You know what to do
Unravel the potential secrets hidden in each metro station, earn achievements and who knows what else you might stumble upon!

▪ Don’t forget your headphones
At each metro stop you will be greeted by an atmospheric soundtrack by Victor Butzelaar, including a cello performance by Sebastiaan van Halsema!

tr.description:
A desperate letter summons detective Paul Trilby to a peculiar island town, divided by a wall and ruled by a Hospital. Regular citizens get admitted and then return without their memories. A sinister conspiracy is afoot. Can you get to the bottom of this mystery?

Use wit, curiosity and lateral thinking to puzzle your way towards a solution, helped by the local citizens you meet along the way. Remember that there is always a grain of truth in the local gossip. 

Follow the Meaning is a surreal, hand-drawn, point-and-click adventure inspired by classic titles like Samorost and the Rusty Lake series.  

Features

■ Hand-drawn art brings the offbeat world to life
■ Whimsical worldbuilding with a sinister undertone
■ Atmospheric soundtrack by Victor Butzelaar
■ A twisted mystery that awaits your diligent inspection
■ 1.5 hours average playtime

tr.description:
WHAT IS ScanGo?
ScanGo is a little, simple, flexible, easy-to-use app with kinds of features satisfying different situations in your iPhone. It allows you to scan documents, certificates, credit cards, invoices, receipts, tickets and any paper with high quality image & PDF output. Also, you can extract text by OCR function from any scans just by one tap.
It is also a camera scanner with concise, efficient user interface whose main tone is black & white with teal & chrome yellow embellished throughout the app. 

HOW TO SCAN DOCS?
- Scan everything by one click, of course you can choose to scan from Photos or Camera.
- Edit docs after scanning immediately, including add, rotate, adjust, reorder and delete pages.
- Rotate, Crop and Adjust filter to get high quality scans.
- Provided five filter modes to enhance your scans - Original, B&W 1, B&W 2, Color, Grayscale. What’s more, each filter can be adjusted for its own Brightness, Contrast, Saturation and Sharpness.

HOW TO MANAGE DOCS?
- The Recents module on home page shows your recently added docs, which helps to find them faster.
- Add folders and sub-folders to manage scanned docs.
- Rename folders and documents to make them more distinguishable.
- Important and urgent documents can be Starred for faster access.
- Search function helps to find the doc you need from a dizzying array.
- Every folder, doc and page can be shared with email, Dropbox, Google Drive, Evernote etc. or Wifi directly.
- Save scans as JPEG to Photos.
- Move/Copy/Delete docs and pages.
- Print scans directly within app once you connect to a Printer.
- Fax scans directly if you have Fax Pro app installed.

AFRAID OF DATA LOSS?
ScanGo supports syncing data with iCloud. 

MAKE THE APP MORE EFFICIENT
CONVENIENT - Turn on the camera immediately whenever you open the app.
HANDY - Save scans to Photos automatically.
EASY - Auto edge detection and enhancement.
SIMPLE - Share docs and folders in default PDF size.
SECURE - Protect your documents with passcode.

MORE QUESTIONS?
If you have any problems with ScanGo, please email us at scango@beesoft.io, we’ll help to figure it out asap.

tr.description:
Available exclusively on the App Store, meticulously designed to be beautifully powerful, and painstakingly engineered for iPad — Inspire Pro delivers an incredibly fast and realistic painting, drawing, and sketching experience that you can take with you wherever you go and use whenever inspiration strikes.

Our proprietary painting engine Sorcery™ takes full advantage of the GPU to render brush strokes with brilliant 64-bit colour, laser-sharp sub-pixel precision, and insanely fast speed. While the strokes of a wet oil paint brush look beautiful on their own, the breathtaking blending effects of a dry brush will absolutely stun you. Graze the canvas with just a bit of pressure to add a subtle blur to your artwork or use stronger pressure to actually mix existing colours on the canvas together to create new ones.

Whether you are a budding artist, seasoned professional, or somewhere in-between, you will enjoy the simplicity and power of the most intuitive and compelling illustration app for iPad, Inspire Pro.

Amazing Brushes
• 150 high-quality brushes to choose from, divided into 15 sets: Oil Paint, Airbrushes, Spray Paint, Paint Splatter, Graphite Pencils, Wax Crayons, Markers, Chalk, Charcoal, Pastels & Conté, Basic Shapes, Complex Shapes, Shape Outlines, Patterns, and Textures
• All brushes can be used as a Wet Brush, Dry Brush (Blending), or Eraser
• Over 20 different settings are available to customize brush strokes with powerful versatility and variation

The Best Painting App for iPad
• Sorcery™, the fastest 64-bit painting engine on the App Store
• Full-fledged Apple Pencil support for pressure, tilt angle, orientation, and double-tap
• Smart Keyboard support with over 20 context-sensitive keyboard shortcuts
• Create a canvas of any size up to 16K (64MP) on iPad Pro
• Dual-texture brushes
• 64-bit colour
• All device orientations are supported all the time — switch from portrait to landscape painting with ease
• 1000 levels of undo and redo are available
• Touch and slide hotspots can be used to quickly change brush size, opacity, and pressure without opening a menu
• The eyedropper tool can be used with a touch and hold gesture to select paint colours from the canvas
• The canvas can be moved around, rotated, and zoomed in and out up to 6400%

Canvas Playback Video Recording
• Brush strokes are automatically recorded as you paint without any delay
• You can play the video of your artwork being created stroke-by-stroke directly in the gallery
• Exported videos are high quality HD at up to 1080p resolution

Full-Featured Colour Picker
• Choose any paint colour you can dream of with the intuitive colour picker
• HSB and RGB sliders accompany a large colour circle, colour square, and opacity slider
• Your latest colours are saved to a palette automatically while you paint
• You can also save your favourite colours to a palette with drag and drop

Visit snowCanoe.com to check out more screenshots, videos and artwork.

tr.description:
Cyber Manhunt is a Cyber-Style, Realistic- Society theme, Story-Rich indie game. The game taked place in the Republic of Alivia with some different theme stories ,but the fate of the characters is closely related in there. It will focus on social issues liking big data, hacking, citizen privacy etc... 

We want to reveal the profound themes behind the stories with wonderful plots and gamification. And let players pay more attention to Cyber Violence and Privacy Breaches.

[Contents]
◆Chapter I: Death of a Programmer
The CEO of a company committed suicide by jumping off a building, and claimed that he was extorted tens of millions by his wife. While his wife posted photos of domestic violence on social networks. Who is lying?
◆Chapter II: Invisible Eyes
The indecent video of the female college student went viral on the Internet. At this moment, she was already socially dead. Who is the initiator? Who should protect the safety of women?
◆Chapter III: The Evidence Vanishes
The student council president, who is both excellent in character and study, suddenly disappeared. The bullying incident made the case more complicated. Who is the murderer and who is the victim?
◆Chapter IV: The Price of Humiliation
The female singer has been exposed again! Threatening letters, hype, the suicide of former girl group members... The Internet has set off a public opinion carnival again!
◆Chapter V: Immortal Code
When the society is in madness, are you willing to join the Immortal Code to obtain true love and immortality?
◆DLC: Home Sweet Home
Behind this seemingly sweet and happy family, everyone has their own secrets, what is the truth hidden behind?!
◆DLC: Hello World!
Senior researcher of Titan Dr. Lucrezia died in a terrible car accident on the spot, but the fellow Benjamin took escape from death. But he did not realize that he was about to be involved in a huge conspiracy…

[Features]
◆Highly Immersive: Gamers play as a hacker in the game, accepts the commission of the company, and solve dangerous incidents.
◆Rich Gameplay: There are lots of features of Social Engineering in the game, which is including Detecting, Tracking, Puzzles-Solving, Destroying and Hacking etc..
◆Wonderful Plots: Each chapter in the game will reflect a current hot social topic, such as: Sneak Shot, Cyber Violence, School Bullying, etc...
◆Multiple Roles: There are many different roles in this game with a flash of personality. Their stories would be dug by yourself.
◆Fully Dubbing: All the characters in the game have their own voice actors that make the game experience more immersive.
◆Original Music: There are some original songs in the game, and the lyrics and vocals are all completed by the studio.

[Gameplay]
◆Web Search: You should collect basic information about the targets through the Internet search.
◆Database: You can use the database to get deep information about targets.
◆Crack: You would get passwords based on the obtained target's information, and use it to log in to accounts of different platforms.
◆Chat: The exciting thing is that you need to chat with targets by disguise and use the information to get the trust of the target.
◆Phishing: You can send phishing links to hack the targets' hardware devices, and get private information.
◆Picture Analysis: You can get valuable information and relevant clues from pictures.
More advanced hacking methods will be unlocked later!

tr.releaseNotes: Lunar arc addition, improvements to performance, and feed.
tr.description:
Plan sun and moon positions before you arrive. Predict golden hour, moonrise, and light direction—plus widgets that keep key times visible at a glance.

Know where the light will be—before you go.

Solar Arc is a sun and moon planning tool built for people who care about timing, direction, and alignment. Instead of guessing or arriving too late, you can predict exactly how light will move across a location—hours or days in advance.

Whether you’re scouting, planning a shoot, or timing a sunset or moonrise, Solar Arc gives you clarity before you commit.

--

Plan with Precision

• Live Sun & Moon Arc Visualization
See real-time solar and lunar paths with compass-based direction.

• Golden Hour & Blue Hour Forecasts
Know the precise windows when light is at its best.

• Moonrise & Moonset Planning
Track lunar timing and position for night and landscape work.

• Forecasting & Location Planning
Preview sun and moon paths for any date, anywhere.

• Offline Access
All core planning tools work without a connection in the field.

pt.releaseNotes:
O jogo agora tem integração com o Game Center, com salvamento na nuvem e conquistas!

Agora, o seu progresso é salvo para cada quebra-cabeça! Pode sair do jogo a qualquer momento e voltar de onde parou.

A forma como o toque funciona foi modificada para que as formas possam ser colocadas mais facilmente.

Também corrigimos alguns erros.
pt.description:
Lugar à janela ou no corredor? Cabine ou mesa? Bicho do mato ou alma da festa? Em Is This Seat Taken?, a tua missão é organizar grupos de formas de acordo com as suas preferências. É um jogo de quebra-cabeças lógico, acolhedor e sem pressão, onde és responsável por decidir quem se senta onde.

Seja no cinema, num autocarro lotado, numa festa de casamento ou num táxi apertado, cada ambiente apresenta novas personagens com gostos específicos. Um convidado de uma festa com um olfato sensível não ficará feliz sentado ao lado de um estranho que esteja a usar demasiado perfume. Um passageiro ensonado não ficará feliz a tentar dormir no autocarro ao lado de alguém que esteja a ouvir música alta. É tudo uma questão de ler a sala para encontrar o lugar perfeito!

Nat quer representar e o seu mundo é virado de pernas para o ar quando vê uma forma igual a si no grande ecrã. Esta descoberta leva Nat a embarcar numa viagem pelo mundo para conhecer o seu ídolo e descobrir como se integrar. Vive a comovente história de Nat enquanto viajas de cidade em cidade, cada uma com os seus próprios níveis, personagens e charme.

- Organiza lugares para agradar a personagens exigentes.
- Descobre as características únicas de cada personagem: simples, excêntricas, tudo o que possas imaginar.
- Resolve quebra-cabeças satisfatórios sem cronómetros ou tabelas de classificação.
- Desbloqueia novos cenários divertidos à medida que avanças: desde viagens de autocarro a banquetes!

pt.releaseNotes: Correções de bugs e melhorias de performance
pt.description:
Corre pelo globo com cores vibrantes e estilizadas através de uma vista superior. Compete pelo primeiro lugar na tabela de líderes através de desafios diários e semanais.
Acha que consegues te tornar um mestre no art of rally?

Experimente a era de ouro dos ralis no modo carreira, viajando pela Finlândia, Sardenha em Itália, Noruega, Japão, Alemanha e Quênia, completando um total de 72 provas especiais de classificação.

Controla o teu carro favorito de rali, seja dos anos 60 ou 80, seja grupo b, grupo s ou grupo a.

Desde opções de pilotagem para iniciantes até modos de pilotagem avançados para os pilotos mais experientes, todos os jogadores podem competir usando as suas técnicas favoritas como o famoso Scandinavian flick, contra-brecagem, travão com o pé esquerdo e travão de mão.

Coloca o teu nome no topo da tabela de lideres nos eventos diarios e semanais.
Mostra as tuas capacidades, ou os teus momentos preferidos com o modo câmera e o modo repetição que estão integrados no art of rally.

pt.description:
A tão esperada sequência do ‘The Room’, que foi o Apple’s Game of the Year 2012 e recebeu o prêmio BAFTA, finalmente chegou. 
Siga uma trilha de cartas misteriosas de um enigmático cientista conhecido apenas por "AS", num eletrizante mundo de mistério e exploração.
 
DESIGN PEGAR-E-JOGAR
Fácil de começar e difícil de largar, uma mistura viciante de quebra-cabeças com uma interface de usuário simples
 
CONTROLES DE TOQUE INOVADORES
Uma experiência tátil tão natural que você pode quase sentir a superfície de cada objeto
 
CENÁRIOS 3D REALISTAS
Mergulhe numa variedade de ambientes formidáveis que desafiarão suas habilidades para resolver quebra-cabeças. 
 
OBJETOS 3D DETALHADOS
Raciocine com os intricados detalhes de dúzias de artefatos na busca por seus segredos secretos.
 
ÁUDIO ASSUSTADOR
Uma trilha sonora macabra e efeitos sonoros dinâmicos criam um ambiente sonoro que reage ao seu jogo.
 
AGORA COM SUPORTE AO iCLOUD E GAMECENTER 
Compartilhe seu progresso entre vários dispositivos e desbloqueie conquistas novinhas.
 
SUPORTE MULTILÍNGUAS
Disponível em inglês, francês, italiano, alemão, espanhol e português brasileiro.

*******************************************************************************************************************
 
A Fireproof Games é um pequeno estúdio independente localizado em Guildford, no Reino Unido.
Saiba mais em fireproofgames.com
Siga-nos: @Fireproof_Games

pt.description:
Halls of Torment é um jogo de sobrevivência contra hordas com um visual retrô pré-renderizado, reminiscente dos RPGs dos anos 90. Escolha um dos muitos personagens heróis e desça aos Mortais Salões da Tormenta. Lute contra horrores profanos do além e sobreviva a onda após onda de inimigos até enfrentar um dos Senhores atormentados.

Fortaleça seu herói com características, habilidades e itens. Crie uma nova construção poderosa a cada partida. Explore diversas expansões subterrâneas e encontre novos itens poderosos que permitem aventurar-se ainda mais no abismo.

Primeiramente disponível no Steam, o roguelike RPG de sobrevivência estilo anos 90, Halls of Torment, agora faz sua estreia no mobile!

【Características】
◆ Corridas rápidas e casuais de 30 minutos
◆ Estilo de arte pré-renderizado à moda antiga
◆ Progressão meta baseada em missões
◆ Grande seleção de habilidades, características e itens diversos, permitindo criar sinergias interessantes
◆ Chefes diversos com mecânicas e padrões de ataque únicos
◆ Vários personagens distintos que permitem diferentes estilos de jogo
◆ Desbloqueie e explore vários mundos subterrâneos interessantes e desafiadores
◆ Itens únicos podem ser enviados para o mundo superior e usados para personalizar futuras partidas
◆ Crie tinturas mágicas para direcionar o destino a seu favor
◆ Desbloqueie o poder de cada classe e combine-os com o personagem escolhido
◆ Encontre variantes raras de itens para melhorar ainda mais suas construções

【Lista Completa de Conteúdo】
◆ 6 níveis com ambientes únicos
◆ 12 personagens jogáveis e marcas de personagem
◆ 25 bênçãos para te fortalecer em cada partida
◆ 68 itens diferentes para obter e desbloquear
◆ 240 variantes mais raras de itens
◆ 80+ habilidades e melhorias de habilidade
◆ 40+ artefactos para personalizar a tua jogabilidade
◆ 35+ bosses únicos
◆ 70+ monstros únicos
◆ 500+ missões a concluir
◆ 1000+ aptidões que melhoram personagens e habilidades

Nossa lista de conteúdo ainda está crescendo, espere mais no futuro!

【Entre em Contato】
